home.intro: This is a demo application with some glitches and bugs, where we hope that you can finde them. ğŸ˜ƒ Here the list of known issues:
home.sidenote: All bugs have a different level of complexity and all of them are pretty common (real wolrd problems for any react developer). To solve all open points a different set of skills are required: googling, experience, reading docs and error messages, creativity and analytical thinking.

issues.title: Console error: Warning: Each child in a list should have a unique "key" prop.
issues.description: Hope you are able to find what is causing this error, as it is annoying.

issues.title: The word "known" should be displayed bold in the introduction text.
issues.description: When implementing a solution, please ensure to not change the i18n text.

issues.title: User avatar in app bar is missing, although user should be fetched on app start correctly.
issues.description: On app start we load the current user object via a MobX store, but for any reason the user avatar is not displayed in the top right of the app bar. Attention: When solving this issue, you might will be confronted with a second bug.

issues.title: Optional: Countdown is broken sometimes (hard to reproduce).
issues.description: Some developers mentioned that the countdown in the app header behaves strange sometimes, but unfortunately they were not able to reproduce this glitch reliably, maybe you find the root cause.

issues.title: Optional: It would be great to be able to switch the language.
issues.description: Please add a language select control in the app bar to switch the UI language between english and german.
